attributes.action: Convicted Rioters should face Lengthy Prison Sentences
attributes.additional_details:
To petition the Government to pass emergency legislation requiring the courts to sentence any persons convicted of criminal acts during the current riots to face a minimum term of 5 years in prison for adults and 3 years in a young offenders institute for minors.

Four and five month prison sentences do not deter these dangerous people or keep them off our streets for long enough.
